definitions.definition: A person who buys and sells shares ( stock ) on a stock exchange on behalf of clients . May also provide investment advice and/or company information, depending on the level of service offered (or chosen by the client).

main_definition: ( finance ) A person who buys and sells shares ( stock ) on a stock exchange on behalf of clients . May also provide investment advice and/or company information, depending on the level of service offered (or chosen by the client).
